Posts.EditableText:
I was browsing the unanswered posts link but whenever I replied to (two of) them the forum took me back to the message editor with the error message:

[quote:1a5v0n64]At least one new post has been made to this topic. You may wish to review your post in light of this.[/quote:1a5v0n64]

But the only new post was mine. If I tried to resend my posts I'd get the same error and a duplicate reply would appear on the thread.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Is the date going weird or is there something wrong with my head? This thread says it was posted on Friday Jan 9th 2015 but the 9th was yesterday and that was a Monday... viewtopic.php?p=34686#p34686
